short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically pokes back on Facebook when you have the poke page open. Now enjoy all your free time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Facebook poke back extension will help you win poke wars. When you visit facebook.com/pokes, it will automatically click the Poke Back button after 2 seconds when someone pokes you.
